long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Vaughan Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to help users easily discover relevant courses based on their browsing activity. By leveraging advanced scraping techniques, this extension extracts key data from educational websites and recommends courses tailored to the user's interests and learning goals.
